translations: 1. 颠倒，倒置：使某物上下或内外翻转。
· The artist inverts the colors in the painting.
这位艺术家在画作中颠倒了颜色。
2. 反转，逆转：使某种关系、顺序或优先级发生改变。
· The new policy inverts the order of priorities.
新政策颠覆了优先次序。

sentences.sentence: These include Inverts and their variations as well as some dedicated air-to-lip combinations.
sentences.translation: 这些措施包括反转及其变化，以及一些专用空唇组合。

sentences.sentence: One hundred of the stamps sold to the public became known as "inverts", for the plane was printed upside down.
sentences.translation: 因为蓝色的飞机被印颠倒了，仅仅有一百枚这种“倒转”邮票卖给公众。

sentences.sentence: One hundred of the stamps sold to the public became know as "inverts", for the plane was printed upside down.
sentences.translation: 因为蓝色的飞机因颠倒了，仅仅有一百枚这种“倒转”邮票卖给工种。
